messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Medical Officer's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Port Bow Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that all of the station's [REDACTED] has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on scans from our long-range sensors, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed lizard level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.
